abstract: Federal Judge Marc T Treadwell sets hearing for motion by transgender inmate Ashley Diamond, who seeks an immediate transfer to lower-security prison from Georgia State Prison, where she says she has been victim of sexual assault.
lead_paragraph: A federal district judge on Monday set a hearing for Thursday on an emergency motion in the case of a transgender woman, Ashley Diamond, who is seeking an immediate transfer to a lower-security prison or “transitional center” so that she can be safer from sexual assault.

headline.main: Georgia: Judge Sets Hearing on Request by Transgender Inmate for Transfer
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Judge Sets Hearing on Request by Transgender Inmate for Transfer
